message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it, and I'm willing to part with it for a price of $1800000. This is a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique and valuable.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $1400000 is a bit of a stretch for me. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $1600000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm thinking of a price of $1500000. Can you consider meeting me at this price?

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1600000. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a premium support package and a personalized consultation with the product's creator. This package is usually worth $100000, but I'll include it for free if you're willing to meet me at $1550000.
I appreciate the extras, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the price, so I'll offer $1525000. Can you consider this price?

I understand that you're trying to get as close to your target price as possible, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1600000. But I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll throw in an additional bonus package, worth $20000, which includes a personalized demo and a guaranteed 30-day satisfaction guarantee. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only willing to make it if you meet me at $1580000.
